faq.question: Cela affectera-t-il mon flux de travail d'édition?
faq.answer: No, our Agrandisseur integrates seamlessly with existing workflows like Lightroom and Photoshop.

faq.question: Peut-il gérer différentes marques d'appareils photo?
faq.answer: Oui, nous supportons les fichiers RAW de tous les grands fabricants d'appareils photo, y compris Canon, Nikon, Sony et Fujifilm.

faq.question: Is it suitable for Professionnel Impression work?
faq.answer: Absolutely, our output meets Professionnel Impression standards for galleries and exhibitions.

faq.question: How does Amélioration compare to using higher-end cameras?
faq.answer: While IA Amélioration significantly improves Qualité, it complements rather than replaces high-end camera capabilities. Meilleur results come from good source files enhanced with IA technology.

faq.question: Can I maintain my photography style during Amélioration?
faq.answer: Yes, our Amélioration preserves your artistic style while improving technical Qualité. You can fine-tune results to match your vision.

faq.question: Is Lot Traitement efficient for large weddings or events?
faq.answer: Absolutely, our Lot Traitement capabilities are designed for handling large volumes while maintaining consistent Qualité across all Images.

faq.question: Peut-il fonctionner avec des arrière-plans transparents?
faq.answer: Oui, notre outil préserve la transparence et fonctionne bien avec les fichiers PNG et les conceptions en calques.

faq.question: Is it suitable for logo Design?
faq.answer: For vector logos, we recommend SVG Format. For raster logos, our Amélioration can significantly improve Qualité.

faq.question: How does it handle text in Images?
faq.answer: Our IA algorithms are trained to preserve text clarity and readability during Amélioration.

faq.question: Can it maintain brand colors during Amélioration?
faq.answer: Oui, notre technologie préserve les couleurs exactes de la marque et maintient la cohérence de marque dans tous les éléments améliorés.

faq.question: Is it suitable for both Web and Impression Design?
faq.answer: Absolutely, we optimize enhancements for specific output requirements, whether Numérique or Impression.

faq.question: How can I ensure consistency across large Design projects?
faq.answer: Our Lot Traitement with custom presets ensures consistent Amélioration Qualité across entire Design campaigns.
